entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
